name: Core Release 30.3.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs. This core API release brings you with a few new features and improvements.

ADDED.text: Added Passwordless email and username APIs with OTP support.
Added SocialLogin with Ping API with no callback feature.
Previous verification tokens can now be expired once a new token is requested automatically.
Resetpasswordurl whitelisting is required to use Forgot password feature.

IMPROVED.text: Added OTP Code option for Passwordless Login by Email/Username APIs.
